x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Checking for duplicate overrides of Nuvolo Properties
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Duplicate Nuv Properties - Reservations
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Go to Nuvolo Properties list and remove the extra override.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_f16805231b6cdd10ae5b21b5ec4bcb5a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Checking for duplicate overrides of Nuvolo Properties</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Duplicate Nuv Properties - Reservations</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Go to Nuvolo Properties list and remove the extra override. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var x = util.checkDuplicateOverrides('Space Reservation');

if (x != false) {
	util.handleOutput('There is a Nuvolo Property ' + x + ', that has two overrides within the Nuvolo Properties table. Each Nuvolo Property should have at maximum one override value', 'Error','Reservation');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-13 15:18:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>f16805231b6cdd10ae5b21b5ec4bcb5a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Duplicate Nuv Properties - Reservations</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_f16805231b6cdd10ae5b21b5ec4bcb5a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:34</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
